content:
That sounds like a great plan!

So, let's block out your morning routine:

**Weekdays (Monday to Friday)**

* 6:30 am - Wake up
* 6:40 am - 10-minute meditation session
* 6:50 am - 30-minute yoga routine
* 7:20 am - Shower and get ready for the day

**Weekends (Saturday and Sunday)**

* 8:30 am - Wake up
* 8:40 am - 10-minute meditation session
* 8:50 am - 30-minute yoga routine
* 9:20 am - Shower and get ready for the day

How does that look to you? This schedule allows you to fit in your meditation and yoga practice before starting your day, which can help set a positive tone and give you a sense of accomplishment.

Remember to be flexible and adjust the schedule as needed. If you need a few extra minutes of sleep or have an unexpected commitment, don't stress about it. Just try to prioritize your meditation and yoga practice as much as possible.

Also, don't forget to leave some buffer time in your schedule for any unexpected things that might come up. You might want to consider adding a 10-15 minute buffer between your yoga routine and getting ready for the day, just in case you need a little extra time to get ready.

How does this schedule look to you?
